resources.string: Power saver on. No items enabled.

Enable the Background activity manager to extend the battery life. While this is enabled, some app/email notifications may not be retrieved instantly. You can manage the battery life by adding Apps to or removing them from the whitelist.
Turning on this function may prevent applications from receiving real-time information from the Internet while the screen is off.
To work properly, this app requires additional permissions. Please allow permissions when asked.
"To work properly, this app requires additional permissions. Please manage %s's permissions in Setting."

Turning on this function may prevent applications with alarm or notification functions from waking up the device on time. We recommend that you add those applications to the whitelist for periodic wake-up from their Settings pages.
